query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		structuredscopesconnection {
			edges {
				node {
					_id,
					archived_at,
					asset_identifier,
					asset_type,
					availability_requirement,
					confidentiality_requirement,
					created_at,
					eligible_for_bounty,
					eligible_for_submission,
					id,
					instruction,
					integrity_requirement,
					max_severity,
					reference,
					rendered_instruction,
					updated_at,
					url,
				},
			},
			max_updated_at,
			total_count,
		}
	}
